cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on April 21, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1228, Libya Stabilization Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 34 (Tuesday, February 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DEUTCH:
H.R. 1228.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 of the U.S. Constitution.
[Page H588]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: Libya Stabilization Act
